General.Name: Jeju Bank
General.Description: Jeju Bank, together with its subsidiaries, provides commercial banking products and services in South Korea. The company also provides trust and foreign exchange services. It operates through business branches in Jeju Island; and domestic branches outside of Jeju Island. The company was incorporated in 1969 and is headquartered in Jeju-si, South Korea. Jeju Bank operates as a subsidiary of Shinhan Financial Group Co., Ltd.
